mi:PackageInformation.name: Composite.Media.ImageGallery.Slimbox2
mi:PackageInformation.author: Composite A/S
mi:PackageInformation.TechnicalDetails: Displays a gallery of images on a page using Slimbox 2 (http://www.digitalia.be/software/slimbox2), a highly customizable gallery/showcase plugin for jQuery.
mi:PackageInformation.Description: Displays a gallery of images on a page using Slimbox 2 (http://www.digitalia.be/software/slimbox2), a highly customizable gallery/showcase plugin for jQuery.
